headline: Keefe Bruyette Raises Riot Platforms (RIOT) PT to $23, Keeps Outperform Rating After AMD Data Center Lease Deal
summary: Riot Platforms Inc. (NASDAQ:RIOT) is one of the best high short interest stocks with biggest upside potential. On January 27, Keefe Bruyette analyst Stephen Glagola raised the firm’s price target on Riot Platforms to $23 from $16 while maintaining an Outperform rating, following the company’s 10-year 25MW Data Center Lease and Services Agreement with AMD […]
